column4: hello, I am using kubuntu/edgy and trying to download images from my digicam (ptp/ip) via usb and digicam, but it doesnt work. it works as root using gphoto2. gphoto2 fails if user calls it. the user is in the group plugdev. So it is a problem wit
h the access rights, but what can i do? has udev to do with it ?
if you just changed groups: logout and back in.
no sorry, i changed group time ago
